description: Provides an overview of the CHT system metrics

options.content:
# CHT Admin Dashboard

See the [CHT documentation](https://docs.communityhealthtoolkit.org/apps/guides/hosting/monitoring/) for more information about monitoring and alerting!

panels.description: Software versions for the CHT stack
panels.title: CHT Version Info

panels.description: Rate of creation of docs in the Couch databases.
panels.title: DB Growth Rate

panels.description: How long API has been running.
panels.title: CHT Uptime

panels.description: Number of users that have connected to the api in the past month.
panels.title: Monthly Active Users

panels.description: Number of users that exceeded the replication limit of documents.
panels.title: Users Over Replication Limit

panels.description: Rate of creation of doc conflicts which need to be resolved manually.
panels.title: DB Conflicts Rate

panels.description: The fragmentation of the db, lower is better, “1” is no fragmentation.
panels.title: DB Fragmentation

panels.description: Indicates if the CHT server time matches the time of the Grafana server.
panels.title: Server Time Accurate

panels.description: Number of changes yet to be processed by Outbound Push.
panels.title: Outbound Push Backlog

panels.description: Number of changes yet to be processed by Sentinel.
panels.title: Sentinel Backlog

panels.description: Number of CouchDB changes that have not yet been processed by Couch2pg
panels.title: Couch2pg Backlog

panels.description: Number of feedback docs created usually indicative of client side errors.
panels.title: Client Feedback/Error Rate

panels.description: Alerts that need attention
panels.title: Alerts

panels.description: Recent releases in the Community Healthcare Toolkit ecosystem
panels.title: Recent CHT Releases

panels.description: The percentage of messages successfully delivered in the last 24hrs
panels.title: Message Delivery Rate [24h]

panels.description: Indicates if Prometheus is up.
panels.title: Prometheus

panels.description: Number of Prometheus samples collected in the last hour.
panels.title: Prometheus Sample Rate

panels.description: Sum of all skipped Prometheus scrapes in the past 30 days
panels.title: Skipped Scrapes [30d]

panels.description: How long it took to scrape a data source
panels.title: Scrape Duration

panels.description: Total number of rejected scrapes in Prometheus
panels.title: Prometheus Rejected Scrapes

panels.description: Indicates if the JSON Exporter (used for scraping CHT metrics) is up.
panels.title: JSON Exporter

title: CHT Admin Overview
